1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import PandaController as panda
4 import numpy as np
5 import rospy
6 import tf2_ros
7 
8 VMAX = .1
9 FREQUENCY = 50.
10 PERIOD = 1. / FREQUENCY
11 
12 
13 def switch_point():
14  pass
15 
16 
17 if __name__ == '__main__':
18 
19  points = np.array([[.6, .5, .5],
20  [.6, .5, 1],
21  [.6, 1, 1],
22  [.6, 1, .5]])
23 
24  pc = panda.PandaController()
25 
26  tfBuffer = tf2_ros.Buffer()
27  listener = tf2_ros.TransformListener(tfBuffer)
28 
29  rate = rospy.Rate(FREQUENCY)
30  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
31  try:
32  # Current position vector
33  transformation = \
34  tfBuffer.lookup_transform('panda_link8', 'world', rospy.Time())
35  translation = transformation.transform.translation
36  vector_0_EE = \
37  np.array([translation.x, translation.y, translation.z])
38  # Desired position vector
39  vector_0_EE_d = points[0, :]
40  # Error vector
41  vector_error = vector_0_EE_d - vector_0_EE
42  vector_error_norm = np.linalg.norm(vector_error)
43  vector_error_unit = vector_error / vector_error_norm
44 
45  # End effector cartesian velocity
46  velocity = VMAX * vector_error_unit
47  # TODO
48  # q = Jinv * velocity
49  # pc.publish_velocities(q, PERIOD)
50  except (tf2_ros.LookupException, tf2_ros.ConnectivityException,
51  tf2_ros.ExtrapolationException):
52  rate.sleep()
53  continue
